TopicTitle: Hello from a recently obsessed Kerbonaut

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I discovered this game 2 days ago, and tried the demo. Since it had me making rockets for 5 hours straight, and going into orbit to the sun (fortunate mistake ) yesterday I bought it. Still having fun, but I was surprised by the lack of extra content such as training scenarios, scenarios etc. I have managed to get stuff into orbit pretty easily, but haven't really figured a design to leave orbit for the Mun or towards another planet. Much less land a "Rover" or something like that. I'd greatly appreciate some advice from people who have been playing this game longer.

Thanks a bunch!

And to be more specific... How do I get the PB-ION engine to work? Apparently I can't build up enough electricity...

Sorry for the double post.

Welcome to the forums!

To get the ion engine to work, you'll need both electric charge and a xenon container.

I've started recently and had the same problem...but I've found the mechanics are very solid. Any intro to basic orbital mechanics should be great for an intro to this game...

Above all...persistence...never give up!
